# Course information

This is the course material for STAT115/215 BIO/BST282 at Harvard University.  
All the YouTube videos in this course are organized under the [2021 STAT115 playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLeB-Dlq-v6taAXK6ZCGfqImrNWJzFt3p3).
